title: The Government Is Testing Military-Grade Technology To Keep Drones Away From Airports
text:
09 The Government Is Testing Military-Grade Technology To Keep Drones Away From Airports 
Nextgov: The Fed­er­al Avi­ation Ad­min­is­tra­tion is test­ing mil­it­ary-grade tech­no­logy to keep com­mer­cial and per­son­al drones in the U.S. from get­ting near air­ports and oth­er sens­it­ive air­space.
